## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install *sapera*.

```bash
pip install sapera
```

## Usage
*sapera* can be run as a command-line program, in your terminal run
```bash
sapera
#It won't do anything now, I am working to make it work ASAP
```
